articles.title: Hasura raises $100 million, becomes tenth startup unicorn of 2022 - Economic Times
articles.description: With the latest fundraise, Hasura is valued at $1 billion, making it the tenth startup to enter Indias unicorn club this year.
articles.content: Bengaluru: Hasura, a software company which helps developers with tools, has raised $100 million in a fresh funding round led by Greenoaks Capital. The round also saw participation from existing inve… [+2070 chars]
